ui.panel.home.editor.title: Edit home page
ui.panel.home.editor.description: Configure your home page display preferences.
ui.panel.home.editor.favorite_entities_h: Display your favorite entities. GiToon will still suggest based on commonly used up to 8 slots.
ui.panel.home.editor.save_failed: Failed to save home page configuration
ui.panel.home.editor.areas_hint: You can rearrange your floors and areas in the order that best represents your house on the {areas_page}.
